title: Howling Blast
description:
Blast the target with a frigid wind, dealing: 
 - 2H: [(14.37% of Attack Power) * (Attack Power * 0.98)] 
 - DW: [(14.37% of Attack Power) * ((Attack Power Main hand + Attack Power Off hand) * 2/3)] 
 Rank 2: Increase damage 20%

extraInfo.title: Frost Fever
extraInfo.description:
A disease that deals: 
 -2H: [(171.2% of Attack Power) * (Attack Power * 0.98)] 
 -DW: [(171.2% of Attack Power) * ((Attack Power Main hand + Attack Power Off hand) * 2/3)]
